front.title: PCEP extensions for a BGP/MPLS IP-VPN

abstract.t: It is highly desirable for VPN customers to be able to dynamically establish their MPLS TE LSPs in the context of a BGP/MPLS IP-VPN. In such a scenario, it is advantageous to use PCE to calculate customer MPLS TE LSPs. This document defines PCEP extensions for BGP/MPLS IP- VPNs.
